com.communote.plugins.api.rest.service.exception

Class AbstractExceptionMapper<E extends Throwable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugins.api.rest.service.exception.AbstractExceptionMapper<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of the Exception this mapper works for.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationExceptionMapper, AuthorizationExceptionMapper, BlogAccessExceptionMapper, BlogIdentifierValidationExceptionMapper, BlogNotFoundExceptionMapper, BlogValidationExceptionMapper, CommunoteEntityNotFoundExceptionMapper, ExceptionMapper, ExtensionNotSupportedExceptionMapper, IllegalArgumentExceptionMapper, IllegalRequestParameterExceptionMapper, JsonMappingExceptionMapper, JsonParseExceptionMapper, MaxLengthReachedExceptionMapper, NoBlogManagerLeftExceptionMapper, NonUniqueBlogIdentifierExceptionMapper, NoteManagementAuthorizationExceptionMapper, NoteManagementExceptionMapper, NoteNotFoundExceptionMapper, NotePreProcessorExceptionMapper, NotFoundExceptionMapper, ParameterValidationExceptionMapper, ResponseBuildExceptionMapper, RestApiIllegalRequestParameterExceptionMapper

    public abstract class AbstractExceptionMapper<E extends Throwable>
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper<E>
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • handle

        public ApiResult<Object> handle(E exception,
                                ApiResult<Object> apiResult)
        Subclass can override this method to add more detailed information to the response via the api result. This implementation will write the message of the exception as message of the api result.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception.
        apiResult - The api result this mapper can handle with.
        Returns:
        The ApiResult which should be used for the response.
